You are not seeing the New Document option due to one or more of the following issues:

  • Stage is not in Contract
  • The number of MLS Board records does not match the total number of IDX Tools
  • Tier Plan is blank
  • Subscription Start Date or Term is blank
  • Any billing address field on the related Account is blank
